issues.text: Unusual characters (e.g., '', '¬') appear in several deal descriptions (e.g., '50 50% off', '$5¬GiftCard', 'BOGO30', '30 30% off', 'Up to35'), indicating potential character encoding or rendering problems.

Multiple sections display 'Loading...' placeholders, suggesting dynamic content failed to load or is missing from the static HTML (e.g., after 'Ready for the night' and after 'Trick or treat... or sip?').

Asterisks ('*') are used next to some offers (e.g., 'Ulta Beauty at Target*', 'kitchen & dining items*') implying terms and conditions or disclaimers, but the corresponding disclaimer text is not immediately visible on the page.
Monthly freebie is valid for annual and monthly members with a membership, trials excluded.
Same-day delivery has exclusions that apply.
Restrictions apply for the 5% Target Circle Card Discount.

The 5% discount does not apply to prescriptions and other CVS pharmacy products; Target GiftCards; Visa, Mastercard and American Express prepaid cards; Game On, DraftKings and other sports betting gift cards; Starbucks gift cards purchased at Starbucks locations within Target stores; previous purchases; clinic services at Target; Target Optical eye exams and protection plans; Target Circle 360™ memberships; Shipt memberships; alcohol purchases in IN; some independent businesses in Target stores; wireless protection programs and mobile carrier deposits; gift wrapping services; and taxes, shipping, delivery, handling and all other fees or charges.
The 5% discount applies to eligible purchases minus any other discounts and the value of any promotional Target GiftCards received in the transaction.
New cards are subject to application approval and identity verification.
Item eligibility and assortment for 2-day shipping vary by market and are determined by the location of the item and the destination ZIP code.

Extended returns do not apply to Target Optical purchases; non-returnable items; contract mobile phones; or online purchases of Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP) eligible items using Electronic Benefits Transfer (EBT), or both EBT and a Target Circle Card for payment.
Target reserves the right to discontinue or alter the terms of the extended returns program at any time.

For Target™ Mastercard® 1% and 2% Reward, to qualify for rewards redemption, you must earn a minimum of $10 in rewards and your Target Mastercard account cannot be more than one month past due. Rewards are forfeited if your Target Mastercard is closed. Additional restrictions apply.
Target Circle 360™ same-day delivery applies to orders over $35.
The $99 annual membership fee discounted to $49 when you have a Target Circle Card cannot be applied to previous purchases or combined with other promotions.
Restrictions apply for Community support votes.
Rewards accumulate on the Target Circle Card account and not on the individual cards.
Rewards may be taken away, redemption/earning prevented, any Target GiftCard reward deactivated, and/or Target Circle Card suspended or closed if fraud, misuse or abuse of the program is determined.
If your Target Circle Card account is closed for any reason, you will have 135 days to redeem available rewards, after which all accumulated, unredeemed rewards will be forfeited.
You will not be able to redeem rewards if our records indicate that mail is undeliverable to the mailing address on file for your Target Circle Card until you update it.
You will not be able to redeem rewards if your account is restricted or suspended (e.g., if your card is lost or Target is investigating fraud on your account).
Target is not responsible for lost or stolen Target GiftCards.
Target is not responsible if a Target GiftCard is not delivered to you.
Rewards are not your property and you have no property rights or other legal interest in them.
Rewards cannot be transferred, assigned, or pledged.
Rewards have no cash value.

Target is not responsible for disputes about this program or about the redemption of a Target GiftCard that you may have with a joint accountholder or an authorized user of your Target Circle Card account.
Target can discontinue or alter the terms of the program at any time.
Target Circle Rewards will expire after one year if you have not earned or redeemed any Target Circle Rewards for one year.
Offer applies only on standard shipping to all 50 states and the District of Columbia as well as APO/FPO addresses and Puerto Rico.
If you upgrade your shipping method, shipping fees will apply (unless Target offers promotions for free shipping on upgraded methods).
Select items may require a minimum purchase threshold before the order will be shipped.
Orders delivered by Shipt may have a delivery fee.
This offer is not valid on previous orders or where otherwise prohibited by law.
Target reserves the right to discontinue or alter the terms of this program at any time.
Every exclusive extra may not be available to every Target Circle Card holder.
The selection of Target Circle Card holders for a specific exclusive extra may be based on criteria, such as previous purchases or geographic location.
Exclusive extras are planned throughout the year at Target's sole discretion and may vary from year to year.
Exclusive extras may have limitations and restrictions.
No credit check is subject to identity verification.
You'll be considered for a Target Mastercard based on your creditworthiness.
If you don't qualify for a Target Mastercard, you'll be considered for a Target Circle Credit Card.
The offer is for Target Circle Rewards when using a Target Circle Debit or Credit card.
You must spend $50 or more on qualifying purchases within 60 days of approval.
Terms apply to Target Circle Rewards.
This offer does not apply to mail-in applications.
Qualifying purchases exclude alcohol, Target GiftCards, Visa, American Express and Mastercard gift cards/prepaid cards, CVS pharmacy, clinic, and Target Optical.
Target Circle Rewards will expire after one year if you have not earned or redeemed any Target Circle Rewards for one year.
Offer for $50 credit card bonus is redeemable through Target Circle and requires spending within the first 60 days following approval.
Offer for $50 debit card bonus is redeemable through Target Circle and requires spending within the first 60 days following approval.
Some restrictions apply to the benefits listed.
Cash withdrawal of up to $40 at checkout is not available with the credit card.
Earning 2% on dining and gas purchases and 1% everywhere else outside of Target is not available with the debit card (exclusive to Target Mastercard).
Some restrictions apply to the Target Mastercard rewards.
Same-day delivery from Target & more local stores with no markups excludes select alcohol retailers and items.
Target reserves the right to discontinue or alter the terms of the 5% discount program at any time.
The 5% discount applies only to the purchase amount tendered to your Target Circle Card if used in the same transaction with another form of payment.
The 5% discount applies to eligible purchases minus any other discounts and the value of any promotional Target gift cards received in the transaction.
The 5% discount does not apply to: Prescriptions, over-the-counter items located behind the pharmacy counter and clinic services at Target.
The 5% discount does not apply to: Target Optical™ eye exams and protection plans (Target Optical products, such as glasses and contact lenses, do receive the 5% discount).

The 5% discount does not apply to: Target GiftCards; Visa, Mastercard and American Express prepaid cards; Game On, DraftKings, and other sports betting gift cards; and Starbucks gift cards purchased at Starbucks locations within Target stores.
The 5% discount does not apply to: Previous purchases.
The 5% discount does not apply to: Target credit account payments, Target Circle Card Account cash reloads, Target Debit Card cash back and cash advances on the Target Mastercard.
The 5% discount does not apply to: Shipt and Target Circle 360™ membership fees.
The 5% discount does not apply to: Alcohol purchases in Indiana.
The 5% discount does not apply to: Wireless protection program purchases and deposits required by mobile carrier.
The 5% discount does not apply to: Gift wrapping services.
The 5% discount does not apply to: Taxes, shipping, delivery, handling and all other fees or charges.
The 5% discount does not apply to: Where otherwise prohibited by law.
Free 2-day shipping applies to most items and eligible items, not all items.
To receive 2-day shipping, orders must be placed by the order cutoff time for select items to select ZIP codes.
The $50 off Target Circle 360 is subject to the terms and conditions of the membership.
The $50 off Target Circle 360 cannot be applied to previous purchases or combined with other promotions.
Target reserves the right to discontinue or alter the terms of the extended return program at any time.
Target Circle™ Card extended returns do not apply to: Target Optical purchases.
Target Circle™ Card extended returns do not apply to: Non-returnable items.
Target Circle™ Card extended returns do not apply to: Contract mobile phones.

Target Circle™ Card extended returns do not apply to: Online purchases of Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP) eligible items using both Electronic Benefits Transfer (EBT) and a Target Circle Card for payment.

Gas merchants are assigned an MCC of 5541 or 5542; merchants that do not specialize in selling automotive gasoline, such as truck stops and boat marinas, are not eligible gas merchants for 2% rewards.

Dining merchants are assigned an MCC of 5812, 5813 or 5814; merchants selling food and beverages within larger establishments such as theme parks, casinos and stadiums are not eligible dining merchants for 2% rewards.
Individual merchants and their credit card processors are responsible for designating MCCs, and Target does not have control over which MCC is assigned to a merchant.
Purchases made at merchants that do not process transactions using one of the specified MCCs will only qualify for 1% rewards.
Target is not responsible if you believe a purchase should be categorized as a gas or dining purchase and it is not.
You will not earn 1% rewards when you shop at Target or Target.com (the 5% Target Circle Card Discount program applies to those purchases instead).
The following types of transactions are not considered eligible purchases for rewards: Cash advances, ATM withdrawals, money orders and other cash or cash-like transactions.
The following types of transactions are not considered eligible purchases for rewards: Target Circle Card account fees and interest charges.
The following types of transactions are not considered eligible purchases for rewards: Unauthorized or fraudulent charges.
The following types of transactions are not considered eligible purchases for rewards: Transactions not allowed by your Target Mastercard Agreement.
The following types of transactions are not considered eligible purchases for rewards: Purchases or reloads of gift cards or prepaid cards.

If an item is returned or if credits or adjustments are made to your Target Circle Card purchase balance, your reward amount will be adjusted accordingly, which may cause your reward amount to be eliminated or create a negative reward amount.
If you have a negative reward amount, any new reward amounts will be applied to the negative reward amount until it reaches zero.
Rewards can be lost, even though they do not expire.
You can only redeem rewards if you have earned at least $10 in rewards and otherwise qualify for rewards redemption.
To redeem rewards for a physical Target GiftCard, you need a valid mailing address on file for your Target Circle Card.
To redeem rewards for a Target eGiftCard, you need a Manage my Target Circle Card account and a valid mailing address and email address on file for your Target Circle Card.
Same-day delivery 'no price markups' excludes select alcohol retailers & items.

Alcohol prices, and prices on non-alcohol items where alcohol is predominantly sold, are generally not the same as in-store, despite 'no markups' claim.
Pricing and availability are subject to change without notice, delays, data limitations, adjustments, and/or errors.
In-store deals may not apply to same-day delivery.
Monthly freebies are valid for annual and monthly members with a membership; trials are excluded.
Discounted monthly memberships for college students and government assistance recipients require verification of status; otherwise, the standard monthly fee will be charged.
Redundant navigation links are present in multiple sections (header, main content, footer), leading to clutter.
Inconsistent presentation of category links is observed; some categories use image-based links while others are simple text lists (e.g., 'Electronics' section).
The 'Baby' category is listed twice, once as a sub-category under 'Clothing, Shoes & Accessories' and again as a top-level category, which could cause confusion.
There are empty or non-descriptive links (e.g., `[](/)`) that do not provide clear navigation.
The 'Sponsored' content section interrupts the flow of category listings, potentially disrupting user browsing.

Target reserves the right to discontinue or alter the terms of the 5% discount program at any time.
The 5% discount applies only to the purchase amount tendered to your Target Circle Card if used in the same transaction with another form of payment.
The 5% discount applies to eligible purchases minus any other discounts and the value of any promotional Target gift cards received in the transaction.
The 5% discount does not apply to: Prescriptions, over-the-counter items located behind the pharmacy counter and clinic services at Target.
The 5% discount does not apply to: Target Optical™ eye exams and protection plans (Target Optical products, such as glasses and contact lenses, do receive the 5% discount).

The 5% discount does not apply to: Target GiftCards; Visa, Mastercard and American Express prepaid cards; Game On, DraftKings, and other sports betting gift cards; and Starbucks gift cards purchased at Starbucks locations within Target stores.
The 5% discount does not apply to: Previous purchases.
The 5% discount does not apply to: Target credit account payments, Target Circle Card Account cash reloads, Target Debit Card cash back and cash advances on the Target Mastercard.
The 5% discount does not apply to: Shipt and Target Circle 360™ membership fees.
The 5% discount does not apply to: Alcohol purchases in Indiana.
The 5% discount does not apply to: Wireless protection program purchases and deposits required by mobile carrier.
The 5% discount does not apply to: Gift wrapping services.
The 5% discount does not apply to: Taxes, shipping, delivery, handling and all other fees or charges.
The 5% discount does not apply to: Where otherwise prohibited by law.
Free 2-day shipping applies to most items and eligible items, not all items.
To receive 2-day shipping, orders must be placed by the order cutoff time for select items to select ZIP codes.
The $50 off Target Circle 360 is subject to the terms and conditions of the membership.
The $50 off Target Circle 360 cannot be applied to previous purchases or combined with other promotions.
Target reserves the right to discontinue or alter the terms of the extended return program at any time.
Target Circle™ Card extended returns do not apply to: Target Optical purchases.
Target Circle™ Card extended returns do not apply to: Non-returnable items.
Target Circle™ Card extended returns do not apply to: Contract mobile phones.

Target Circle™ Card extended returns do not apply to: Online purchases of Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP) eligible items using both Electronic Benefits Transfer (EBT) and a Target Circle Card for payment.

Gas merchants are assigned an MCC of 5541 or 5542; merchants that do not specialize in selling automotive gasoline, such as truck stops and boat marinas, are not eligible gas merchants for 2% rewards.

Dining merchants are assigned an MCC of 5812, 5813 or 5814; merchants selling food and beverages within larger establishments such as theme parks, casinos and stadiums are not eligible dining merchants for 2% rewards.
Individual merchants and their credit card processors are responsible for designating MCCs, and Target does not have control over which MCC is assigned to a merchant.
Purchases made at merchants that do not process transactions using one of the specified MCCs will only qualify for 1% rewards.
Target is not responsible if you believe a purchase should be categorized as a gas or dining purchase and it is not.
You will not earn 1% rewards when you shop at Target or Target.com (the 5% Target Circle Card Discount program applies to those purchases instead).
The following types of transactions are not considered eligible purchases for rewards: Cash advances, ATM withdrawals, money orders and other cash or cash-like transactions.
The following types of transactions are not considered eligible purchases for rewards: Target Circle Card account fees and interest charges.
The following types of transactions are not considered eligible purchases for rewards: Unauthorized or fraudulent charges.
The following types of transactions are not considered eligible purchases for rewards: Transactions not allowed by your Target Mastercard Agreement.
The following types of transactions are not considered eligible purchases for rewards: Purchases or reloads of gift cards or prepaid cards.

If an item is returned or if credits or adjustments are made to your Target Circle Card purchase balance, your reward amount will be adjusted accordingly, which may cause your reward amount to be eliminated or create a negative reward amount.
If you have a negative reward amount, any new reward amounts will be applied to the negative reward amount until it reaches zero.
Rewards can be lost, even though they do not expire.

issues: Redundant navigation links are present in multiple sections (header, main content, footer), leading to clutter.
Inconsistent presentation of category links is observed; some categories use image-based links while others are simple text lists (e.g., 'Electronics' section).
The 'Baby' category is listed twice, once as a sub-category under 'Clothing, Shoes & Accessories' and again as a top-level category, which could cause confusion.
There are empty or non-descriptive links (e.g., `[](/)`) that do not provide clear navigation.
The 'Sponsored' content section interrupts the flow of category listings, potentially disrupting user browsing.
recommendations: Consolidate and standardize the placement of global navigation links to avoid redundancy and improve page clarity.
Apply a consistent visual style (e.g., all image-based or all text-based) across all main category listings for better user experience and visual coherence.
Clarify the category hierarchy to prevent confusion from duplicate listings, perhaps by distinguishing between 'Baby Clothing' and a broader 'All Baby Products' category.
Ensure all links are functional and provide clear, descriptive text or alt attributes for improved accessibility and usability.
Relocate promotional or sponsored content to a less intrusive area, such as a dedicated sidebar or the page footer, to maintain the flow of category browsing.
